operating_fees.info: Fees must be paid at the airport office before departure
Payment for fuel can be made at the fueling station

parking_fees.info: Short-term parking is available near the terminal
Long-term parking is available in the designated parking lot

passanger_fees.info: Domestic passenger fees are included in the ticket price
International passenger fees are included in the ticket price

other_information: Please contact the airport administration for any additional information regarding fees and payments
